meta.description: Generate clear, standardized Pull Request descriptions with AI. Provide the type, context and changed files — AI builds the complete template.

hero.title: PR Description Generator
hero.subtitle: Professional templates generated by AI
hero.description: Fill in your PR context and receive a professional, standardized description in seconds. PR types, summary, changes, testing and breaking change notes.

Review and adapt the result before publishing

items.label: New feature
items.title: Add Google OAuth authentication
items.description: Implemented Google login using NextAuth.js. The OAuth2 provider was configured with callback at /api/auth/[...nextauth]. Session persisted via JWT with automatic refresh. Added route protection via middleware and automatic redirect to login when needed.

items.label: Bug fix
items.title: Fix memory leak in usePolling hook
items.description: The usePolling hook was not clearing the setInterval when unmounting the component, causing setState calls on unmounted components and console warnings. Added proper cleanup in the useEffect return.

items.label: Refactoring
items.title: Extract filters logic into custom hook
items.description: Moved all filter, sorting and pagination logic from the product listing page into a useFilters hook. The component is ~60 lines shorter, making maintenance and unit testing easier.
